title: German Unification
summary: Germany unified under King Wilhelm I of Prussia, who was crowned Emperor of Germany in the %{Palace of Versailles#Place of Versailles} in France. The unification was in process since the %{Congress of Vienna#Congress of Vienna} in 1815, and was completed after the %{Franco-Prussian War#Franco-Prussian War} in 1871. But it can really be seen in the %{Zolverin} Agreement in 1834, when the German states created a customs union.
